name: .ORF
summary: Learn about .ORF files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open ORF files with Olympus-specific software, such as Olympus Workspace and Olympus Master, or with third-party applications. Some image editors that support ORF files include Adobe Photoshop (multiplatform), Corel AfterShot Pro (multiplatform), and Adobe Photoshop Express (Android and iOS).
If you are a Mac user, you can also view ORF images with Apple Preview and Apple Photos, which both come bundled with macOS.

NOTE: While most Olympus digital cameras capture images as ORF files, many of them produce ORF files with different formatting. Therefore, some applications may recognize certain ORF files but not others.

You can convert ORF files to other image formats, such as JPEG and PNG with several image editors, including Adobe Photoshop and Corel PaintShop Pro (Windows). In macOS, you can also convert ORF images to other formats with Preview by selecting File → Export....

You can convert ORF files to other image formats, such as JPEG and PNG with several image editors, including Adobe Photoshop and Corel PaintShop Pro (Windows). In macOS, you can also convert ORF images to other formats with Preview by selecting File → Export....
